title: Test
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 13 data points.
Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2006 to 2012, gradually increasing from 2012 to 2016, slightly decreasing from 2016 to 2018, and lastly roughly constant from 2018 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Max Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 29.96 was recorded at Year 2016
Min Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 15.3 was recorded at Year 2011
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2011 to 2016.
Also, the next significant trend is moderately constant which exists from 2006 to 2009.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2016 to 2019.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is moderately constant which exists from 2009 to 2011.
